name: heal-pulse
effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.
short_effect: Heals the target for half its max HP.

flavor_text.sun_moon: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: The user emits a healing pulse that restores the target’s HP by up to half of its max HP.
